Anything else that could help us review it
items.title: Fixes #8670 - Makes explicit the example reference

items.content_html:
Spec: https://immersive-web.github.io/webxr-hand-input/

  • Document XRInputSource.hand
  • Update XRInputSource.profiles
  • Add hand-tracking feature descriptor to XRSystem.requestSession()
items.title: Document WebXR Hand Input part 1

items.content_html:
The writing direction sensitivity of the direction of rotation seems to be an unspecified feature whose practical implications are so obviously appropriate that it seems to have been consistently yet silently implemented. Tested in Chrome and Firefox. However, its effect is sometimes unexpected, like when angle quotation marks are repurposed as twisties (and their bidi-mirrored=yes property does not fix it).

Issue number that this PR fixes (if any). For example: 'Fixes #987654321'

None.

What was wrong/why is this fix needed? (quick summary only)

Missing information.

Anything else that could help us review it

Same problem in https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/angle
items.title: Added very important yet missing information.

items.content_html: I made a typo. This dictionary has the profile option, not space https://immersive-web.github.io/hit-test/#transient-input-hit-test-options-dictionary (the other hit test dictionary has space)
items.title: WebXR transient input hit test: fix typo space -> profile

items.content_html:
Bumps snok/install-poetry from 1.1.8 to 1.2.

Release notes

Sourced from snok/install-poetry's releases.

v1.2.0

Features

  • Added an installer-parallel input for configuring the installer.parallel config option. Thanks @‚Äãmiigotu üëç
  • Updated the version default to latest. Not specifying version will now always install the latest stable release - just like with the regular Poetry installer.

Other improvements

  • Updated action help texts. Outputs now include the installation path to make caching the installation directory even easier.
  • Moved all Poetry configuration logic from an external script, into the action.yml, for better maintainability

v1.2.0-rc1

  • Updated action help texts
  • Moved the external configuration script into the action itself to ease development
  • Changed the version default from a specific version to latest. When latest is specified, the latest version of Poetry will be installed.
Commits
  • fdde2e9 Move scripts, remove unused git files, and add a pre-commit hook (#52)
  • 986ce95 Merge pull request #51 from snok/sondrelg/miigotu/installer-parallel
  • ab5fd14 Only configure parallel installer setting on Poetry versions that have the se...
  • c4090fe Add ability to set installer.parallel config option with action arguments.
  • a174040 Update tag_release workflow to run on releases, rather than the 'published' t...
  • 124a7e5 Merge pull request #50 from snok/latest-version-default
  • ac7afa2 Merge branch 'main' into latest-version-default
  • f2698d6 Merge pull request #49 from snok/remove-script
  • 69f9c16 Update help texts
  • 7dd63a4 Add test to check version default
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

items.content_html:
Adds item to Firefox 93 release notes that .initKeyEvent has been deprecated and that extension developers who want to initiate a KeyboardEvent object should use a KeyboardEvent constructor instead.

Related bugs:

https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1727024
https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1727502
https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1717760

// cc @rpl
items.title: Add note about initKeyEvent deprecation to Firefox release notes for 93

items.title: Add missing ondragleave attribute.

What was wrong/why is this fix needed? (quick summary only)

This is my first time contributing to MDN, so apologies if I have missed out anything.
items.title: Adds Glossary page for Clickjacking
